description: {"blocks":[{"key":"667t2","text":"Single cell RNA-seq and ATAC-seq protocol for PBMCs treated with LPS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"93ilr","text":"Needed for day 1:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4e02h","text":"Countess slides","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4o3gh","text":"Trypan blue","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4lp1a","text":"SCAIP media (90% RPMI 1640 +10%CS-FBS+ 0.1% gentamycin)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ud9k","text":"1 round-bottom 96-well plates","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fvh10","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ts3f","text":"Needed for day 2:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"494p","text":"Treatment media (See treatments page below)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ttth","text":"Ice-cold PBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fh2el","text":"PBS with 0.04% BSA","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9fft4","text":"Trypan blue","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"egdin","text":"10X Genomics instrument and kits","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"58u1d","text":"Cell Processing – day 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"lcug","text":"Transfer the selected cryovials from liquid nitrogen into dry ice then store in -80C. The day before seeding the plates (Day 1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5517m","text":"Day 1:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8i40f","text":"1. Thaw one vial of PBMCs in the water bath. Transfer immediately to 6mL of room temperature SCAIP media and mix gently using a wide-bore tip. Rinse the cryovial with an additional 1 ml of media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9tpeh","text":"2. Count cells on Countess: 10ul cells + 10ul Trypan Blue, Check for viability, and record on the Cell counting sheet page","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4cigs","text":"3. Repeat for 11 additional samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"35p2h","text":"4. Centrifuge cells at 400xg for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ee5d8","text":"5. Resuspend cells to 2x106 cells/mL in a culture medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fpl12","text":"6. Plate 4 wells x 100ul in round-bottom 96-well plates using a wide-bore tip (4wells/individual). Each individual is a separate column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7afv8","text":"7. Incubate in SCAIP Media overnight at 37C and 5% CO2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4fge","text":"8. For each sample, spin the remaining Cells and freeze the pellet for DNA (-80C freezer).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cs17a","text":"Cell Processing – Day 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d8j7f","text":"Protocol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cr6k","text":"1. Prepare treatments (LPS, PHA, Dex, EtOH) – see Treatments page","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fkgov","text":"2. Add 2ul of treatments to their respective wells (multi-channel).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"13hg2","text":"3. Incubate for 6 hrs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8t9nv","text":"On ice:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6rd0o","text":"4. Take the plate out of the incubator and pool across rows/individuals (4 pools of 12 individuals):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6tik5","text":"* Use multi-channel to gently mix the media using a wide-bore tip and transfer column1(treatment plate) to column 1 of the deep-well plate. Then repeat to transfer columns 2-12 (treatment plate) to column 1 of the deep-well plate. Next, wash columns 1-12 in the treatment plate with 100ul cold PBS then pool to column 2 of the deep-well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"76rfh","text":"5. Pool each row into a 5 ml tube using a wide-bore tip (4 tubes total).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b5ma5","text":"6. Centrifuge @300rcf, 5 min, 4oC as per the 10X SC Protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"40kmd","text":"7. Remove the supernatant, wash with 5 ml ice-cold PBS+0.04% BSA, and centrifuge again.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1r3h7","text":"8. Resuspend in 1ml ice-cold PBS+ 0.04% BSA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fgva8","text":"9. If significant amounts of cell clumps or debris are observed, gently mix cells by pipetting up and down 10 – 15 times and filter cells using a Flowmi Cell Strainer (40 µm).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8ftcs","text":"10. Count cells on the countess, check viability, and record.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9oo50","text":"9. Make sure cell concentration is within the target range of 0.7 M/ml – 1.2 M/ml (aim to capture 25k cells by loading 60K). Adjust if needed. Ideally, viability should be 90% and above acceptable above 80%. Proceed with the 10x Genomics® Single Cell Protocols","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Single cell RNA-seq and ATAC-seq protocol for PBMCs treated with LPS
